snippet: Joining the parade of men’s boutiques in the Marais, Givenchy shows off its mix of haute history and sharp detailing.
abstract: Shoppers flock to Givenchy men's boutique in Marais, Paris, lured by aggressive prints and streetwise fashion designed by store’s artistic director Riccardo Tisci.
lead_paragraph: Joining the parade of men’s boutiques in the Marais, Givenchy shows off its mix of haute history and sharp detailing.

headline.print_headline: At Givenchy in Paris, Toughness and Light
headline.main: At Givenchy’s Men’s Shop in Paris, the Two Sides of Riccardo Tisci
